name: ListEnterpriseDependabotAlerts
description:
Get Dependabot alerts for enterprise-owned repositories.

This tool retrieves a list of Dependabot alerts for repositories owned by a specified enterprise on GitHub. It is used by members of the enterprise with appropriate access tokens. Alerts are restricted to organizations where the user is an owner or security manager.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: The slug or ID of the enterprise. This identifies the enterprise for which alerts are listed.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: alert_state_filter
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of alert states to filter by: `dismissed`, `fixed`, `open`. Only alerts with these states will be returned.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of states. If specified, only alerts with these states will be returned.

Can be: `dismissed`, `fixed`, `open`

parameters.name: alert_severities
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of alert severities to filter results. Options: `low`, `medium`, `high`, `critical`.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of severities. If specified, only alerts with these severities will be returned.

Can be: `low`, `medium`, `high`, `critical`

parameters.name: ecosystem_list
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ecosystems to filter alerts. Options include: `composer`, `go`, `maven`, `npm`, `nuget`, `pip`, `pub`, `rubygems`, `rust`.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of ecosystems. If specified, only alerts for these ecosystems will be returned.

Can be: `composer`, `go`, `maven`, `npm`, `nuget`, `pip`, `pub`, `rubygems`, `rust`

parameters.name: package_filter
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of package names. Specify to filter alerts by these packages.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of package names. If specified, only alerts for these packages will be returned.

parameters.name: vulnerable_dependency_scope
parameters.description: The scope of the vulnerable dependency to filter alerts by. Options: 'development', 'runtime'.

value_schema.description: The scope of the vulnerable dependency. If specified, only alerts with this scope will be returned.

parameters.name: sort_property_for_alerts
parameters.description: Specifies the property to sort Dependabot alerts by. Options are 'created' (when the alert was created) or 'updated' (when the alert's state last changed).

value_schema.description:
The property by which to sort the results.
`created` means when the alert was created.
`updated` means when the alert's state last changed.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting order of the results, either ascending ('asc') or descending ('desc').

value_schema.description: The direction to sort the results by.

parameters.name: before_cursor
parameters.description: Specify a cursor to fetch results before this point. Use the format provided in the Link header.

value_schema.description: A cursor, as given in the [Link header](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#link-header). If specified, the query only searches for results before this cursor.

parameters.name: cursor_after
parameters.description: A cursor to return results after a specific point. Use as given in the Link header for pagination.

value_schema.description: A cursor, as given in the [Link header](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#link-header). If specified, the query only searches for results after this cursor.

parameters.name: number_of_results_per_page_starting_first
parameters.description: **Deprecated**. Specifies the number of results per page (maximum 100), beginning with the first matching result. Avoid using with `number_of_results_per_page_starting_last`. Use `results_per_page` with `paging_after_cursor` instead.

value_schema.description:
**Deprecated**. The number of results per page (max 100), starting from the first matching result.
This parameter must not be used in combination with `last`.
Instead, use `per_page` in combination with `after` to fetch the first page of results.

parameters.name: results_per_page_starting_from_last
parameters.description: **Deprecated**. Number of results per page (max 100), starting from the last matching result. Avoid using with 'results_per_page_starting_from_first'.

value_schema.description:
**Deprecated**. The number of results per page (max 100), starting from the last matching result.
This parameter must not be used in combination with `first`.
Instead, use `per_page` in combination with `before` to fetch the last page of results.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.
